name: Steamer French Toast
description: Thank you, Kayla Zinck, for this recipe!
preparation: In a bowl, beat eggs, milk, and Apple Pie Spice or Cinnamon.
Tear bread into pieces and add to egg mixture.
Pour into Omelet Maker. Close and microwave on high, about 2 min.
Drizzle with maple syrup, if desired.

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie â€“ or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.

products.name: Cinnamon (Ground)
summary: A simple blend of organic cinnamon that brings the flavour. Great for baking, desserts, egg nog, or enhancing the taste of Middle Eastern and Indian dishes.
